text: Lheuhnyan teukeudi nibak Hadharat Anco han meupat keubon nyang indah Han le boh kayee nyang lazat-lazat Yohnyan teulah that rugoe- sileupah Padumna rugoe beulanja le that Abeh riwayat bandum ka sudah Watee nyan jikheun ulon teulah that Keu peue Hadharat lonkheun le leupah Adak kon Tuhan lon peucharikat Teuntee lon meuhat han meunoe sudah
